Plot: In this making-of documentary we hear from Stan Lee, Arad, Raimi, Maguire, Curtis, Franco, Ziskin, Dunst, Grace, Stokdyk, Bradley, Anderson, New York location manager John Fedynick, ...
Title: Spider-Man 3 on Location: Cleveland, the Chase and Euclid Avenue
Actors: Avi Arad, Joseph M. Caracciolo, Grant Curtis, James Franco
